CustomField.description: The "Pro Forma Invoice Number" is used in the subcontractor claims process upload report/template. It is supposed to be prepopulated in a certain format as soft enforcement of standards, to keep the "proforma" invoice numbers across contractors/subcontractors consistent. For Example: WSL-MSN-2021-11-HYDROTECH-300
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please enter the pro forma invoice number in the following format: WSL-MSN-YYYY-MM-SUBCONTRACTORNAME-CLAIMNUMBER
CustomField.label: Pro Forma Invoice Number
